lastFeatures.title: Start your health journey
lastFeatures.subTitle: We are here to provide you with the medical support you deserve. Consult a selection of certified doctors easily and at any time that suits you, and enjoy a safe, fast, and personalized service for your health needs.

About.title: About Us
About.subTitle: Specialist Platform is a leading digital platform in the field of telemedicine, aiming to provide exceptional medical services in an innovative, safe, and accessible way.
About.visionText: To deliver exceptional healthcare by utilizing modern technology and achieving the highest levels of quality and efficiency in the medical services provided.
About.missionText: To provide innovative, safe, and accessible medical services through an integrated digital platform that connects doctors and patients, ensuring exceptional healthcare.

someServices.text: Easily and securely obtain accurate medical prescriptions from doctors
Conduct medical tests and receive results quickly and accurately
Easily book appointments with specialized doctors
Regular follow-ups with doctors to ensure your health and safety

values.title: Our Values
values.subTitle: We believe in the importance of core values that guide our work and define our identity, and we are committed to applying them in all aspects of our services.

valuesList.description: We are committed to delivering our services at the highest level of professionalism.
We always strive to provide innovative solutions that meet our clients' needs.
We ensure honesty and transparency in all our services.
We work as a team to achieve our shared goals.

Footer.description: Sehatee platform is with you every step of the way towards better health, and we are always happy to hear from you

questions.question: What services do you provide?
questions.answer: We provide comprehensive medical services including online consultations, appointment booking, and medical prescriptions.

questions.question: How can I book an appointment?
questions.answer: You can easily book an appointment through our platform by selecting your preferred doctor and available time slot.

questions.question: What are the payment methods?
questions.answer: We accept various payment methods including credit cards, debit cards, and digital wallets.

questions.question: How can I cancel or reschedule my appointment?
questions.answer: You can cancel or reschedule your appointment through your dashboard up to 24 hours before the scheduled time.

questions.question: Is my medical information secure?
questions.answer: Yes, we use advanced encryption and security measures to protect all your medical and personal information.

TermsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
TermsAndConditions.intro: Welcome to our website specialized in providing telemedicine services. By using our website and its services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to the following terms. If you do not agree to any of them, please do not use the website.

sections.title: 1. Nature of Services
content: We provide a platform for booking appointments and conducting remote medical consultations with licensed doctors.
These consultations are not a complete substitute for a clinical examination, and you may be advised to visit a doctor in person in some cases.

sections.title: 2. Data and Medical Files Privacy
content: We are committed to the confidentiality of all files and medical information you share through the platform.
Your data is stored securely, in accordance with best data protection practices.
By sharing analyses or reports, you grant doctors permission to view them for diagnostic and evaluation purposes only.

sections.title: 3. Booking and Payment
content: The website allows you to book appointments with available doctors and pay for consultations via electronic payment methods.
If you are unable to complete the consultation for any reason, you can contact us to reschedule or request a refund according to our cancellation policy.

sections.title: 4. Usage Responsibility
content: The website acts as an intermediary between the user and the doctor and is not responsible for any medical decisions made by the doctor.
The platform must be used only for legal purposes, and not misused for any improper or fraudulent activity.

sections.title: 5. Disclaimer
content: We are not responsible for any direct or indirect damage resulting from the use of the website or any technical malfunction.
The medical services provided depend on the information provided by the user, and it is the user's responsibility to provide accurate and complete data.

sections.title: 6. Intellectual Property
content: All digital content, such as texts, designs, images, trademarks, and software, is owned by the website and legally protected.
Copying or distributing any part of the website without prior written permission is prohibited.

sections.title: 7. Modification of Terms
content: We may update these terms at any time, and users will be notified when necessary.
Your continued use of the platform after modification means your acceptance of the new terms.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy and Security Policy
PrivacyPolicy.intro: At Okhssai, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This policy aims to explain how we collect, use, and protect the data you provide when using our website.

sections.title: 1. Information We Collect
content: When you use the Okhssai website, we may collect the following information:
Full name.
Email address and phone number.
Basic medical information provided by the user when requesting a consultation or booking an appointment.
Your geographic location (when needed to determine the nearest doctor).
Usage data (such as the pages you visit and how you interact with the website).

sections.title: 2. How We Use the Information
content: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:
Providing online booking and medical consultation services.
Communicating with you regarding your appointments or inquiries.
Improving user experience and developing our services.
Ensuring compliance with local medical laws.

sections.title: 3. Information Sharing
content: We are committed not to share your personal or medical information with any third party except in the following cases:
With doctors for the purpose of providing medical consultations.
When required by law or official authorities.
With service providers who help us operate the website, provided they adhere to strict confidentiality standards.

sections.title: 4. Data Security
content: We use advanced security technologies and procedures to protect your data from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure.
All sensitive information is encrypted and stored securely.

sections.title: 5. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
content: We may use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience and analyze website usage.
You can control or disable cookies through your browser settings, but this may affect some website features.

sections.title: 6. Your Rights
content: You have the right to:
Access your personal information.
Modify or delete your data upon request.
Withdraw your consent to our use of your data at any time.

sections.title: 7. Policy Updates
content: We may update this policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with the review date updated below.
Last Update: May 18, 2025
